question: 面接
sourceMnemonic: Our <kanji>face</kanji>s have <kanji>adjoin</kanji>ed in this one room to talk. You did the telephone interview where you didn't show the face of your face. Now you're showing it, so we can begin the real <vocabulary>interview</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
